alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 2:22PM CDT until May 27 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Whitewater River at Towanda affecting Butler County. For the Whitewater River...including Towanda, Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Towanda. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, The river will be out of its banks on both sides. West bank overflows impact cropland mainly in low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.9 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Whitewater River Towanda 22.0 22.2 Thu 1 pm CDT 16.8 8.7 5.2 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
